Teaching

Source: vignettes/teaching.Rmd
teaching.Rmd

  • Exploratory Graph Analysis (EGA)

    • Introduction to networks
    • Graphical least absolute shrinkage and selection operator (GLASSO)
    • Extended Bayesian information criterion (EBIC) for model selection
    • Community detection: Walktrap and Louvain algorithms
    • Consensus clustering
    • Unidimensionality
    • Entropy and Total Entropy Fit Index (TEFI)
    • EGA with TEFI community selection

  • EGA Robustness

    • Measurement concepts
    • Redundancy and unique variable analysis (UVA)
    • Bootstrap EGA
    • Item and dimension stability
    • Network loadings
    • Metric measurement invariance
    • Hierarchical EGA

  • Dynamic EGA

    • Generalized Local Linear Approximation
    • Dynamic EGA
    • Normalized Mutual Information
    • Jensen-Shannon Distance
    • Hierarchical Clustering
    • Information Theory Clustering
